Sentencas: This article presents the results of a study of the characteristics of materials based on lanthanum nickelate lyte materials at 900 degrees C are analyzed.
Titulo: Investigation of the Characteristics of Materials with the Ruddlesden-Popper Structure for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients are determined and the temperature dependences of the conductivities are studied.
Titulo: Investigation of the Characteristics of Materials with the Ruddlesden-Popper Structure for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of these materials in contact with the electrolyte material YSZ is also measured.
Titulo: Investigation of the Characteristics of Materials with the Ruddlesden-Popper Structure for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: As a result of the study, the following cathode materials were investigated: La2Ni1-xCoxO4 (0 <= x <= 0.3), Pr2NiO4.
Titulo: Investigation of the Characteristics of Materials with the Ruddlesden-Popper Structure for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this case, the influence of low concentrations of Co on the characteristics of lanthanum nickelate was studied for the first time.
Titulo: Investigation of the Characteristics of Materials with the Ruddlesden-Popper Structure for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Materials based on lanthanum nickelate and praseodymium nickelate were characterized by a structure of the K2NiF4 type (RuddlesdenPopper phases) with rhombic symmetry.
Titulo: Investigation of the Characteristics of Materials with the Ruddlesden-Popper Structure for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A study of the thermal expansion of cathode materials showed that all the studied materials are characterized by higher CTEs than YSZ and GDC electrolytes.
Titulo: Investigation of the Characteristics of Materials with the Ruddlesden-Popper Structure for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Based on the studies performed, cathode materials were chosen for the formation of composites with GDC electrolyte: La2NiO4, La2Ni0.8Co0.2O4, Pr2NiO4.
Titulo: Investigation of the Characteristics of Materials with the Ruddlesden-Popper Structure for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A study of the sintering kinetics and CTE of composites showed that their thermal characteristics are much closer to those of electrolytes than those of pure cathode materials.
Titulo: Investigation of the Characteristics of Materials with the Ruddlesden-Popper Structure for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
